room_title: Escape room "Candy Caper" by Clueless Escape Rooms in Ann Arbor
room_address: 5204 Jackson Rd, Suite F Ann Arbor, MI 48103
room_description:
You inherit your estranged grandfatherâ€™s candy shop, which was known for its unique chocolate. Being a distrustful old man, Grandpa refused to share his chocolate recipe with anyone. When he fell ill, he hid pieces of his recipe throughout the candy shop.
Unfortunately, there is still a large mortgage owed and the bank is ready to foreclose. If you can find the secret recipe you will be able to continue running the business and pay back the mortgage. Can you save the Candy Shop?
